description: Position of Danger/Safety arguments section in the motion. Section order matters for persuasive impact.
chroma_query_template: danger safety threat section position placement {case_context}

recommendations.critical: Place Danger/Safety arguments early in the motion (optimal: position 6.8, range 4-10).
recommendations.rationale: Section order matters for persuasive impact. Earlier placement = more emphasis. Strategic placement shows you know what matters most.
recommendations.insight: Position matters: judges read sequentially, so early sections get more attention.

suggestions: Place Danger/Safety arguments early in the argument section
Don't bury it at the end
Balance with other arguments (privacy, public interest) but prioritize safety concerns
